item.title: How Can i assign a GFX to a skill
item.dc:creator: @benimator benimator
item.description:
@benimator wrote:

ok… so i made a server i added construction… how can i make it so when i build an object it will trigger the GFX.

Where would i put it in this code?

break; case 28164: if(c.playerLevel[21] >= 1) { if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 2000) return; c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.sM("You Create: North Wall"); c.addSkillXP(150, 21); c.makeGlobalObject(c.absX, c.absY, 2854, -1, 0); } break;

GFX # 624

Thanks

Read full topic
